wikipedia_page.main:
Joanna Dukes is an English actress, perhaps best known as Toni 'Tiddler' Tildesley in Press Gang. She has no further acting credits after Press Gang ended in 1993.
In her later life, she was a credited a Bafta and a golden globe for her performance as well as becoming a licensed pilot and beauty esthetician Her second daughter, Jodie Dukes comments on her mother's fame saying that ‘life is difficult living in the shadow of a TV legend’.

response: * Toni "Tiddler" Tildesley (Joanna Dukes) is the junior member of the team, responsible for the junior section, Junior Junior Gazette.
